description:
This bizarre issue (bizarre even for The Maxx) starts with Mr. Gone and some Isz spying on the Maxx through a telescope. They see Maxx dozing off on Julies couch while watching cartoons.

The Maxx finds himself in a dream world resembling his favorite cartoon, ‘The Crappon in a Hat. This spoof of the Cat in the hat is all in rhyme. It hints at what is behind Maxx’s mask. In this dream Maxx removes his mask and finds seeds that grow into the Outback where Maxx finds a child version of Julie. Li’l Julie tells Maxx that he is the deepest parts of Julies subconscious and that he shouldn’t be there. The maxx awakes and tells Julie of his dream. Julie figures that the outback is something the Maxx made up.

Horridus, whose parents committed suicide, enters the Police Academy. Mrs. Darling is injured in an "accident". Dragon and Dart rescue Barbaric and Ricochet from Cesspool. Barbaric and Ricochet join the force. Debbie's mother is questioned. Ricochet meets Rapture, who's forced to kill her ex-pimp.

Violator tells a story of a past Hellspawn to some children, but with his own "twists' on the story.

The Clown, a master of self-promotion, relates the story of a long-ago clash with Medieval Spawn. He portrays the ancient warrior in the worst possible light, preferring instead to feature his own fearsome actions. When a kick from Spawn's horse sends Violator flying, something snaps inside him and he unleashes a gout of mystical fire. The Violator cackles in triumph over the smoking form of his fallen foe.
name: Myths Pt.1

volume.name: Captain Sternn: Running Out of Time

name: Genesis part 1 of 6: Worlds to Conquer

description: Mustang and Catapult find themselves to blame for the death of Timothy Halloran's mother in the fight between them and Bruut and Bloodbath. Bloodbath was able to escape with Timothy Halloran, a young man who had contracted the Theta virus, and left Bruut behind. Mustang and Catapult leave the Halloran house to find the house surrounded by police officers. Some officers enter the house to find Bruut awake and angry. Bruut kills some police officers, fighting Catapult and Mustang again, before he is able to escape by leaping to a helicopter. Mustang and Catapult also escape in the middle of the commotion. Back at Stronghold, the secret headquarters of the Exiles, Amber Hunt is told exactly why she is there by Doctor Deming. Amber Hunt has contracted the Theta virus and it will definitely kill her unless she undergoes an mRNA treatment. Catapult and Mustang arrive to report to Doctor Deming about the mishap over Timothy Halloran and Dr. Deming realizes she will have to get directly attack her opposition to get him from their clutches. The Exiles are told to prepare for a mission at midnight against Malcolm Kort, the other man who gathers people with the Theta virus. Kort and his scientist, Doctor Wendell Deeters, immediately give Timothy Halloran their own form of mRNA therapy but it doesn't go well, as his body seems to refuse the treatment. The Exiles arrive at Malcolm Kort's building to find Timothy Halloran leaping from it, appearing like a humanoid elephant.
name: Fugitives

description: A speedster seems to provide a way out, a way to a better life for Pressure ... until she realizes the newbie comes with dangers of his own.

The Strangers visit Hardcase for advice on how to be an ultra-human and a crime fighter. Hardcase regales the Strangers with his tale of the Squad, his old super-team, and of their unfortunate demise. When telling the story, Hardcase makes a realization that the monster that killed the Squad, NM-E, attacked very soon after the Squad rejected the government agency known as Aladdin. Electrocute informs everyone that she learned where Aladdin's headquarters with her time with J.D. Hunt. Hardcase, Choice and the Strangers go to the headquarters but are stopped by Aladdin agents: Foxfire, Dirt Devil, War Eagle and a mysterious, unknown agent that some of the Strangers recognize.

This story is continued in Strangers #4.
name: Strangers In The Night
Kismet Once, Kismet Twice, Kismet Deadly

description: Ferret and Eternal Man are in Los Angeles and fight against the threat of Extreme, a super-villain tyrant from another universe. The Protectors arrive to assist and Extreme destroys LA, turning it into a hellish landscape.
name: Genesis, Part 3: Fire In The Sky!

description: Prototype runs the armor through a training session when it bursts into flames. They put the fire out and Jimmy Ruiz suffers from a massive headache. He find that is must be the performance enhancing pills that he is given that causes the headaches. Meanwhile, Stanley Leland and Marjorie discuss the issues they are dealing with Ultratech. They bring up the problems being caused by Bob Campbell and Marjorie reveals that she has sent someone to take care of that. Bob Campbell meets an attractive woman at the bar who is insistent that she wants to go home with him. When they are in his bedroom, she reveals herself to be Backstabber, an ultra assassin with long, metallic fingernails. Bob rushes to get his home-made suit of armor and is able to escape. Bob then arrives at his ex-wife's house, a former employee of UltraTech, for help.
name: Games Of Death

description: The Solution are heroes for hire, willing to take missions for a fee. In Russia, nuclear bases are being attacked by Quattro, four ultra-powered mercenaries, and their nuclear warheads are stolen. Meanwhile, the Solution are in Hong Kong fighting the Dragon Fang, the world's largest Triad group. Eventually, an agent of the KGB tries to hire the Solution to stop Quattro from keeping the warheads. When Shadowmage uses her magic to try to divine more information on Quattro, she finds that Rex Mundi senses her presence and is making plans to retaliate immediately.
name: The Problem

description:
continued from Hardcase #4

The Strangers, Hardcase and Choice are being held captive by the secret American government program called the Aladdin project. The combined ultras break free and strike a deal with Aladdin that neither would interfere with each other's goals.
name: Between A Rock And A Hardcase
Holy Terror (Part 3);  Wind of Change;

description:
Peter decides, once and for all, to find out what the deal is with these people who claim to be his parents- are they or aren't they? The aftermath of the Maximum Carnage crossover, this book features the work of the formidable Michelinie and Bagley creative team!

The Hulk has arrived in New York and meets up with Doc Samson who tells him about a Gamma virus experiment. hulk shrugs him off. Later Spiderman and Samson both attend the demonstration where the virus attacks Samsond which makes him more powerful and makes him very angry. Now its up to Spiderman and Hulk to calm him down
name: Samson Unleashed

description: The Lunatic Legion triumphs over the Avengers! With the team either dispersed or kidnapped, Sersi’s telepathic link is the only connection the team has. Who is the mysterious benefactor of Galen Kor? And what does he want with the Avengers?
name: "The First Rule"

description:
The sequel to ‘Citizen Kang’ guest-stars Thunderstrike, US Agent, and War Machine! Terminatrix attempts to expand Chronopolis beyond Kang's seven-millennium boundaries, and discovers a shocking secret about time!

Holografix Cover. Kang, the master of time, has a rival. A sentient explosive cloud that can destroy entire dimensions. It rules the time period before Kang dominated and wants to extend it's reach across the timestream.
name: Borderlands

description: Who will save Viper, leader of Hydra, when a hit has been placed on her head? Guest staring Silver Sable!
name: Television Blind

description:
Daredevil's on the hunt for a mysterious man named Eddie, who's been sowing seeds of discord in the streets of New York. Unfortunately for him, Eddie's also the target of mercenaries led by Silver Sable! This is one showdown Matt Murdock won't be able to talk his way out of!

Silver Sable has been hired to clear up the details of a failed terrorist attack on New York City that happened decades ago. Government forces wish to understand why a vital cannister, one of many, did not shatter as planned in the subway system. Their one lead is a homeless man with strong telepathic powers. Daredevil fights his way through Sable enforcers and manages to track down the homeless man, only for a demonic Daredevil to show up. And this is not a telepathic illusion.
name: Fall From Grace - Part 1

description:
Deadpool gets hold of a briefcase containing information concerning Tolliver's will. Possession is short-lived when Black Tom and the Juggernaut enter the fray. Another caution for Deadpool: Nyko Halfghanaghan is looking for some payback and hires the Executive Elite to take him out. And others are looking to close in on Deadpool: Copycat, Sluggo, Kane, and Slayback all want a piece of the action.

Synopsis

A man named Gezdbadah tries to shake his pursuers in the streets of Cairo. He gets shot in the knee, however, and must confront the mercenaries trying to get a hold of his briefcase. Fortunately, Deadpool comes to his aid. After taking out the mercenaries, Deadpool turns on Gezdbadah and demands to know what's in the briefcase. He learns that there is a disc inside that holds information about the end game for Tolliver's will - rights to the most powerful weapon on Earth. Before Deadpool can secure the case, the Juggernaut knocks a building down and Black Tom Cassiday blasts Deadpool in the back of the head. Black Tom then begins questioning Gezdbadah a little more about the will.

In New Jersey, Sluggo approaches the home of Dorothy Carlysle, mother to Copycat. He asks if Copycat has been around and Dorothy has to admit that it's been years since she's seen her daughter. Sluggo begins to leave when a noose lands around his neck. Copycat pulls him atop the roof. Sluggo tells her that she's linked to Tolliver's will since she and Deadpool were so close. Not only that, but Deadpool has been framed for Foley's death (he was the assistant to Mr. Tolliver). Taking Sluggo's keys, Copycat throws him through her mother's roof and leaves to take part in the hunt for Tolliver's will, hoping she'll become the most powerful person in the world.

Courier arrives in India and meets with Mr. Bashur. Disposing of pleasantries, Bashur hears about Nyko Halfghanaghan's desire for revenge concerning his brother's death. Bashur also receives a disc that holds information on Tolliver's will. He arranges for his team, the Executive Elite, to take Deadpool down and claim the will's spoils.

Wanting the briefcase back, Deadpool has Weasel figure out which plane the Juggernaut and Black Tom have boarded. He barely catches the landing gear before the plane takes off. Inside the cabin, Deadpool confronts the two thugs. Black Tom gets the upper hand and blasts Deadpool. Once sufficiently healed, Deadpool blasts the plane's door off. Black Tom gets sucked out and Deadpool lassos him. He tells Juggernaut that he'll spare Black Tom for the case. The Juggernaut hands it over easily. Deadpool let's Black Tom go, as in, he let's Black Tom plummet to the earth. Juggernaut leaps from the plane in hopes to save his friend. With the briefcase firmly in hand, Deadpool announces that the plane is officially hijacked.

Off in Maine, Garrison Kane comes home for some rest. Unfortunately, Slayback is there waiting for him. He's looking for their mutual friend Deadpool and expects a little help from Kane.
name: The Circle Chase: Round 2 - Rabbit Season, Duck Season

description: Doom, Rancor and RTV may be gone, but there´s no rest for the weary Guardians as they motivate towards the Moon. There they confront the intriguing Inhuman, Composite! Meanwhile, Aleta stands alone against one of the deadliest and most powerful villains in the Marvel Universe - Loki! All this plus a unique look back into Talon´s early years, including his first meeting with Krugarr! The action and adventure roll on in "Bang! Zoom! To the Moon!"
name: Bang! Zoom! To The Moon!

description:
Hulk follows the Madman who escapes from the jet plane, and kidnaps the English prince Charles. Hulk saves the prince and defeats Madman, who reveals he is in love with the Hulk.

English superheroes Motormouth and Killpower meet the Hulk and aid him during this incident.

Plus: Ulysses Part 3: First Blood.
name: Royal Pain; Ulysses, Part 3: First Blood

description:
Earth's gathered champions are rocketing toward Paradise Omega, home of Adam Warlock's virtuous female doppleganger, the Goddess. Has she been slain? What is next for the heroes?

Thanos has begun his preparations to defeat the Goddess. He enlists the help pf the Silver Surfer. Thanos and Adam Warlock have created a plan. Thanos wears Adam Warlock's soul gem so that Adam may travel to the Soul World to seek assistance from an unlikely ally. Thanos also needs the assistance of Professor X's mind powers. The Surfer is to create a distraction.

They inform Earth's heroes about their distraction they have set up. They reluctantly agree to follow Thanos' plan. Thanos teleports Professor X to them, who is in a catatonic state, to use his mind personally. The Surfer sets off for the distraction while Thanos retrieves a device known as Dreadnaught 666, which he had created long ago to take over the universe.

Meanwhile, the Goddess has sent her Holt Guards to deal with the heroes at Avengers Mansion. They are in utter shock when they find no one there, meaning they are already on their way to Paradise Omega.

The Surfer is now attempting something he never has before, to take in massive amounts of the sun's energy. He may possibly die from this attempt. He swells in size and energy and is guided to Paradise Omega by Hulk and Drax. The Holy Guard is defenseless against him and he destroys the moon surrounding the planet.

The distraction in place, Earth's heroes pull their Quinjets in, which are quickly destroyed by Thor. Hulk and Drax begin to battle Thor. The remaining heroes all use escape pods to land on the planet, where the members of the Holy Guard are waiting. Thanos' plan requires one pod to remain in orbit so he can maintain long range scanning.

Meanwhile, Warlock has reached the person he seeks.......the Magus.
name: Mortal Sins

description: Moon Knight has his ShadowCouncil doctor, Mercy, examine the body of Network. With her blood still on his hands, he happens to touch his new Moon-Mobile. Meanwhile, Frenchie stops by Chloe's apartment, and decides to climb the fire escape, despite his disability, to see if she is inside. Little does he know that she is watching on from across the street. Back at the ShadowKeep, the gremlin that has been messing with Moon Knight's equipment since his visit to Doctor Strange feasts on the Moon-Mobile's powersource, but due to Network's tainted blood, he magically merges with the car, escaping out into the city. Moon Knight takes chase and is shocked to see the car possessed, but even more shocked that it begins transforming, first into a tank, then into a robot. He ends up defeating it, but then the gremlin possesses the entire city, so they simply shut the power down. Frenchie reaches the top of the fire escape, only to be confronted by Agony and another Hellbent, Flare.
name: Mechamorphosis

description:
Having been summoned to Michael Morbius' home by Jack Russell, Dr. Strange concludes his mystic examination of Morbius unable to detect a soul. Furious, the Living Vampire flies out his window, leaving the Sorcerer Supreme to tell Jack that the consequences of Louise Hastings' use of a Darkhold spell to stop Switchblade will soon be felt. Then Strange takes his leave.

Jack transforms to the Werewolf in order to climb to the ledge where he finds Morbius brooding. Then the Darkhold Dwarf mysteriously appears to tell Morbius he can attain his heart's desire with a spell from the Darkhold, which currently sits in a safe in Victoria Montesi's home in New Hope, Pennsylvania. Despite Jack's warning, Morbius flies off toward Pennsylvania. He succeeds in finding the proper spell, then returns to the New York cemetery where Martine Bancroft lies buried, as the Dwarf instructed.

Morbius reads the spell, but instead of becoming human as he'd hoped, Martine rises from her grave.

Soon, they are met by a pack of hellhounds which are, unknown to Morbius, under the command of the entity within Martine's body. The Living Vampire battles the beasts, while 'Martine' feigns desperation and fear.

Meanwhile, in New Hope, the Darkhold Redeemers discover the missing page, and Victoria Montesi senses the use of the spell. They prepare to head for New York.

Elsewhere, Lilith finds her plans proceeding.

Back in the cemetery, Morbius kills two of the hellhounds, and the rest run into town to wreak havok on human victims. Unable to stand by, Morbius gives chase and attacks the hellhounds. Martine follows and reduces her hounds to bones, then floats away, telling Morbius he's not yet worthy of her.

Later, in his apartment, Hastings, Montesi and Sam Buchanan confront a rueful Morbius. The vampire also tells them, "Something terrifying is on the horizon."
name: Better Off Dead

description:
Chaos erupts in Manhattan as Xandu attempts to merge the world of the dead with the world of the living. In the land of the dead, Scarlet Witch, Dr. Strange and Spider-man struggle against Xandu. Captain America tries to hold back waves of undead that seek to reign over the earth.

Artifact: The Wand of Watoomb.

Minor Characters: Melinda Morrison
name: The Queen, My Lord, Is Dead

description:
Direct from the pages of INFINITY CRUSADE #4! The Surfer has become a living cosmic bomb in a last-ditch attempt to stop Goddess - but will he survive the explosion? And meet the Surfer's parents!

Summary
Aboard the Dreadnaught 666, Thanos ponders if the Surfer will survive becoming a human bomb and destroying the moon circling Paradise Omega. The Surfer hits the moon and detonates, blowing it into pieces. He soon awakens in a familiar train station on Zenn-La.

After an odd conversation with the man in the ticket counter he is met by his parents, Elmar and Jartran. His mother tells him that this is the place between life and death and he is somehow stuck in the middle. He has a choice to stay with them or return to the living world.

His father disagrees, bitter over his own life and having destroyed his own family. The Surfer forgives him for his actions and reconciles with him. This causes him to change his mind. They tell the Surfer they will see him again, but now is not his time. He must return.

He returns to reality unconscious. He falls down to the surface of Paradise Omega.
name: The Station

description: Light the Night: Part 1 of 3. Story by J.M. DeMatteis. Art by Klaus Jansen. Spider-Man's old foe Electro has become little more then a side-show act. But when the electrifying villain gets a bright idea, it could mean the end of the wall-crawler.
name: Light the Night, Part 1

description: "In this, the last climactic issue of a four issue series, Tor finally returns to his tribe...to hunt down the murderers of his father and mother. Albeit the differences that distinguish modern man from his stone age counterpart are obvious, marked similarities remain. The relationship of a child and his parents...the emotions of greed...anger...vengeance...and the cruelty of violence are ever present. Despite these baser instincts, we attempt to rise above that level in today's world, and for Tor, this is not the end of our story...only the beginning."
name: "Vengeance"

person_credits.name: Joe Kubert
person_credits.role: writer, artist, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

description:
CRISIS OF CONSCIENCE

PART 1 OF 3 -- INFINITY CRUSADER

The Goddess recruits Spider-Man into her army of devout heroes.

NIGHTWATCH

DEATHMASK
name: Crisis of Conscience (Part 1 of 3)

description:
The poor, poor Lizard. He just can't catch a break. Not only was he the villain Calypso opted to use as a mindless stooge against Spider-Man in "Torment", but he died and rose again three times. What if, however, he only rose from the dead twice?

Plot

As Spider-Man tells Martha Connors the news that her husband has been killed, she reacts with both grief and relief. She had been expecting to hear such news for a long time. However, Billy Connors reacts with rage against Spider-Man. One week later, Spider-Man arrives at Midtown General Hospital to meet Martha Connors. Billy has inexplicably lost his right arm. However, before the web-slinger can get to his room, Calypso arrives and gives Billy a drink to make him "just like daddy".
name: What If... Iron Man of 2020 had been stranded in the past? Rick Jones remained the Hulk? Spider-Man killed the Lizard?

description:
Jubilee mourns Ilyana

Rogue and Gambit go on a date

Betsy and Kwannon try to decide who's who
name: Digging Deeper Between Hope And Sorrow

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

description: Adrian Eiskalt targets Magneto!
name: Point Blank

description: Villain John Wing unleashes the terrible might of Demon Fox against the Blood Syndicate, while Nina Lam is beset by supernatural forces. Plus, Third Rail gives Wise Son a dressing-down about leadership, and an aftereffect of the Big Bang manifests itself in the water.
name: Flash And Burn

description: Rocket has to face her past alone, while Icon's busy fighting the Blood Syndicate  on their home turf!
name: May We Bang You?

description:
The timing of this issue is Bearclaw and Joyleaf as young lovers, before Cutter had been born and while Mantricker was still chieftain.
This is the episode where Bearclaw stakes out a Dreamberry patch that had been raided and plucked dry by the then young Old Maggoty, who had been using underground tunnels to surreptitiously forage the berries for her Dreamberry Wine.

The story itself first appeared in one of the Blood of Ten Chiefs anthologies and was written by Mercedes Lackey.
name: Phantom of the Berry Patch

description:
Bearclaw's sign of the Wolfriders prominently stands at the center of the emblem of the will, inside of Egg's labyrinthine egg. Egg has learned all that Blue Mountain could offer him and begins to finally penetrate the mystery of wolf-blood that is connected to his family's heritage.

He confronts Two-Spear and then beholds Timmain inside of an aquaeous community.
name: LONG DREAM'S ENDING

description:
Pip has now gained control of the Cosmic Egg and declares himself the King of the Universe. He sits and imagines making a perfect universe, where he had all the beer and cigars he could ask for. He would get revenge on those who have wronged him, get women to love him, create a fantastic new body for himself.

While spending time daydreaming of what to do with his power he is attacked by Silhouette, who is able to get him away from the Cosmic Egg. She returns the Goddess to herself once again.

Meanwhile, Adam Warlock has reached the only place where he is at peace - Soul World.
name: Pip, King of the Universe

description:
Sabretooth is free of Tribune and must kill Mystique, but first is after Birdy for betraying him. Sabretooth returns to his mansion just as Birdy is trying to escape in his car. Sabretooth breaks a wall and grabbs his secret motorcycle. Birdy runs overs Sabretooth only to hop in the car. The car hits the rail and they go over the bridge.

Sabretooth makes Birdy go into his head to learn about Tribune.

Later, Birdy helps Sabretooth track down Mystique in Paris. After chasing her, Mystique shapeshifts into his mother. This wierds out Sabretooth. Mystique runs to the Eiffel Tower to her date, Wolverine.
name: A Kiss Before Dying

description:
Overview

The mystery deepens! Hot on the trail of a killer, the private investigator Mantovani finds himself en route to New Orleans, where, unbeknownst to him, our four Grendels are about to converge. And when the devils come together, there is always hell to pay!

Summary

Bixby continues to hallucinate and seems to be contacted by the spirit of Hunter Rose, commanding him to find his skull, which Bixby calls the Relic. He starts a long journey up towards New Orleans in search of it.

Calhoun, who lives in New Orleans, kills a card cheater and continues to win at gambling--then donates his winnings to a children's home.

Gloria continues the search for her own art treasure, and makes her first kills in the process. Gloria and Mantovani both end up in New Orleans and search through the local Grendel Krewe for answers to their quests.
name: Three Searchers, One Lucky Streak

volume.name: Grendel Tales: Four Devils, One Hell

description: Before she can get shot, she tells the crossbowman to go away and he disappears! Cerebus, astoria, and Po meet up and go to see Cirin.
name: Mothers and Daughters 24: Women 12

description:
Magneto and the Acolytes crash Illyana's funeral and a distraught Colossus turns on the X-Men, joining Magneto.

This issue features a wraparound cover with a hologram of Magneto.
name: Fatal Attractions Part 3: ...For What Have I Done

first_appearance_locations.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

location_credits.name: Jean Grey School for Higher Learning

description: The Sentinel, Wolverine, and Jubilee are sucked into a time stream. Wolverine cuts off the Sentinel hand holding Jubilee. Wolverine is seriously injured and the Sentinel knocks the two mutants down the mountain. Wolverine and Jubilee track down the future Sentinel but are capture by a fleet of Sentinels revived by the future Sentinel.
name: The Formicary Mound!

description:
Reign of the Supermen! The Man of Steel, Lois Lane, Superboy & Supergirl try to get to the bottom of the Cyborg & Mongul's plans in "The Return!"

Notes:

  • Triangle 1993 #25.
  • Chronological continuation from Action Comics #690.
  • Chronological continuation in Superman #81.
name: The Return!

description:
Mephisto has made his proposition to Thanos and Warlock: he will provide information about the Cosmic Cubes and they will in turn give him one after the Goddess' defeat. Warlock refuses to give him such power and Mephisto challenges him. Warlock reminds him that he has bested him before in his own domain, he will do no better in this realm.

Thanos agrees to the bargain, leaving Warlock out of it. Mephisto tells them the truth behind the Cubes and how they can be used adversly to what they are meant to do.

Warlock know goes to speak with Eternity and finds him seemingly merging with Infinity. Eternity and Infinity tell him that they are aware of the Goddess, but to them it is of no major importance. They abruptly send Adam away.

Adam returns to Thanos' ship and tells Mephisto to leave. Thanos also tells him that he is no longer required and he will fulfill his end of the bargain. Warlock now knows the Goddess' true intents after speaking with Eternity and has formulated a plan to face her. He placed the Soul Gem on Thanos forehead and his soul is taken into it.

Thanos know nows every aspect o f Warlock, including the Goddess' true plans. He is now left in charge of continuing the operation in Warlock's total trust.
name: Dealing With The Devil!

description:
As war erupts inside Bane's criminal organization, Selina Kyle finds herself caught in the crossfire--quite literally, as a hired assassin blows up her apartment!

Selena Kyle's life is turned inside out as her home is blown away by a hired assassin who's hoping to draw her employer, Bane, out of the shadows. Injured in the attack is Selina's young ward, a runaway named Arizona, who Selina saves from the resulting fire against her better judgment. After making sure Arizona is taken care of, Selina begins the search for the man who tried to kill her with the help of her handler, Leopold. Discovering that the assassin is fleeing to the remote island of Santa Prisca, she goes after him, intent on revenge.

Notes:

  • Special thanks to Frank McLaughlin.
  • Bruce Wayne appears in this issue.
name: Life Lines: Chapter Two: Blast From The Past!

description: Variant: Gold Cover
name: Black

description: Nightwing and Starfire join Flash in all-out war against the Combine in "Back On Track, Chapter 2: Friends and Lovers". Part 2 of 4, continued from the previous issue. Story continues next issue.
name: Back On Track part 2 of 4:Combine Mob

description: Trapped in a strange distant future, the League is compelled to fight an army of savages - to protect the robotic master race! With the ultimate weapon of time control at stake, it might just be a battle to the death!
name: Lest Darkness Fall

description:
The trail of a professional hitman with the skills of an Olympic pentathlon athlete leads Batman to New Orleans and an encounter with the supernatural soul-stealer known as Ragman, in "Snitch."

Notes:

  • Cover dated Late September 1993.
name: Snitch

volume.name: Batman: Legends of the Dark Knight

description:
The Scarecrow has busted out of Arkham and has a new crop of zombie student thugs under his control including the son of Paul Herold, who he killed. Jean Paul Valley, Batman takes down some street thugs and strikes a little more fear into them than Bruce Wayne might. He then rushes off to the university where Bullock and Montoya are gathering information about the Scarecrow. Batman saves them from a booby trapped VHS tape bomb while the Scarecrow readies his plans.

Meanwhile Anarky takes on the Anti-Batz motorcycle gang.

The origin of the Scarecrow is explored, his love of frightening birds and reading books. Eventually he became a psychology professor and decided to take up a life of crime to get cash and show his peers he deserves respect. He carried out a hit on Paul Herold on behalf of a man named Kendrick while Herold's young son watched. His son, now in college is now tortured under Scarecrow's control.

Scarecrow's thugs set off fear gas into ventilation systems around the city, setting off widespread panic. Anarky takes down one of the Scarecrows and snaps him out of his spell while Batman deals with crowd control. Scarecrow creates a giant projection of himself in the Gotham sky proclaiming himself the city's new god of fear.
name: The God of Fear: Part Two of Three

description:
Tao, Part 1 of 2. A gang war in Gotham City's Chinatown forces Batman on a collision course with Dragon, a mystically-trained martial arts assassin from China. Dragon's main target is Johnny Kahn, a man Batman is trying to bring to justice. But Dragon has a second target - Batman himself, who was, as a youth, a training rival of Dragon's in the Far East!

Note this, enthusiasts and haters of religions. This issue has Taoism.
name: Tao, Part One: Bat

volume.name: Batman: Legends of the Dark Knight

description:
Scarecrow demanded Gotham to declare him a god. He contacted Commissioner Gordon and threatened him with a tanker-truck full of fear gas (which was a diversion - he planned on unleashing in Gotham City's water supply). Batman zeroed in on him and caught him. Anarky, who was there first, captured them both. Fear gas struck both Batman and Anarky; Jean Paul's programming defeated the gas and he took down Scarecrow and Anarky.

(continued in Batman 499)
name: The God of Fear, Conclusion

description: The Femforce girls are back in the lead in color as She-Cat and Synn star in "Shopping Maul". A day off and a trip to the mall babysitting Synn sounds like a drag to She-Cat, "till she sees something she really wants to buy. When thieves who grab it manage to escape the 'Cat, it seems like a total loss, until Synn saves the day, without even using her powers. A goofy, day-in-the-life-of story plotted by Tillman Smoot, scripted and drawn by Mark (Magneto) Heike, and inked by Chris (Warrior Nun Areola) Allen. Following that is a pleasant potporri of Golden Age reprint gems, of the glamour art variety: Fiction House features Sky Gal(Girl) from Jumbo Comics, drawn by Matt Baker and printed in color, and Star Pirate, from Planet Comics, with art by Maurice Whitman. Bill Black's text feature focusses on the sexy supporting gals in many of the Fiction House stories that "starred" male leads, in "Window Dressing". Then, it's more Fox Features perfect pulchritude with Matt Baker back on a Phantom Lady story from P. L. #18, June, 1948, "Ghosts, Galleons and Gold", followed by Quality's madcap lovely from the pages of Modern Comics, Torchy- illustrated by Gill Fox. Plus photo coverage of AC spokesmodels at the 1993 San Diego Comicon. Color cover by Brad Gorby and Mark Heike, interiors are color and black and white with graytones. 52 pages, standard comic book format.
name: Shopping Maul

description: Road trip! With their mansion now in ruins, Archer & Armstrong set out on a cross-country trip to retrieve Armstrong's most prized possessions from throughout his incredibly long lifetime! But they'd better move fast, as The Sect is back and on their trail! Meanwhile, Amy makes a shocking discovery about Archer!
name: Vandals

description:
While on assignment in Hong Kong, Neville Alcott's daughter is taken hostage by a crime cartel run by a former MI-6 agent and the soul-eater known as Sosa. Now its down to Bloodshot to run a one-man rescue mission into hostile terrtory and get her out alive!

Death of Sosa the soul eater.

1st appearance:

- Dr. Silk (mentioned only)
name: Blood Sacrifice

description: While chasing down the supply chain of a designer drug in Hong Kong, Gilad saves Bloodshot's life from some surprisingly well-prepared ninja. But the mystery becomes a whole lot clearer when the trail of evidence leads them to a subsidiary of Iwatsu Industries-- the company that created Bloodshot!
name: Death By Design

description: The team put their powers to the test in a booby-trapped ghost town named -- affectionately -- "Slaughter Street". With a saboteur in their midst, a routine field test turns deadly. Can the H.A.R.D. Corps survive, unmask their amorphous assassin, and more importantly, help Hotshot move into her new condo?
name: Return To Slaughter Street

description: Target: Armstrong! Someone in the Valiant Universe has put the unkillable immortal under lock and key, and now Archer has called in his friends Shatiqua, Faith, and Flamingo to help lead the chase!
name: Should Old Acquaintances Be Forgotten?

description: Magnus and company attack a Malev prisoner camp and then face the problem of what to do with and how to help the prisoners who are helpless and apparently in no shape to fight the Malevs in “Indomitable.” Guest starring the Eternal Warrior and the Geomancer.
name: Indomitable

description: The Malev Emperor is launching a new attack! Will Rai and the Future Force be able to fend the off and save their friends - or will they be too late?!
name: Warring Factions

description:
While X-O Manowar and Livewire take to the skies, Bloodshot, Eternal Warrior and Shadowman battle a zombie horde. Now that the alliance against Darque is in full swing, the battle is about to reach a bloody crescendo!

See below: Complete Picture - Front- and Back-Cover.
name: Alliances II

description:
When a government agent arrives to make sure that Turok isn't being exploited in the present time, he learns what happened to his friend Andar.

Turok is ten about five years later in time than form the last issue. What has happened since then is not explained. He discovers his old friend was not killed by Mon-Ark like he thought but Andar was simply transported to an earlier time than Turok.

Turok is also introduced to Andy and Reagan Howell. The three of them will become a new team as they go fourth on a new adventure and as Turok swore to his Brother in Spirit Andar that he would teach Andar the "old ways". Everything ends whenthe FBI come calling to get Turok to "hunt" again.

First Appearances

  • Andy (Grandson of Andar)
  • Reagan Howell (Granddaughter of Andar)
  • Longhunter (Israel Crocket)
name: Shades Of Yesterday Part 1: The Valley Of The Shadow

description: The beginning of an all-new direction for X-O Manowar! Faced with a crisis of conscience, Aric bequeaths the X-O armor to Randy Cartier! Can Randy answer the hero's call or will this sudden surge of power overwhelm her?
name: Strange Bedfellows

description:
The latest in Andreas' tales of the ever-intriguing and endlessly enigmatic Rork premieres this issue with "Rork: Capricorn," and the Jean-Michel Charlier/Moebius saga of gunslinging, greed, and true love continues with "Blueberry: Arizona Love." This issue also features Nicole Hollander's "Sylvia," who analyzes age-related behavior in cats; a sequel to Rick Geary's observations of life, the universe, and everything in "Galaxy II"; another irreverent sci-fi sampling starring Cailleteau & Vatine's "Stan Pulsar," and a beautifully painted cover by Russell Walks.

Story Titles

  • Sylvia
  • Rork: Capricorn Chapter 1
  • Galaxy II: Wandering the Galaxy
  • Stan Pulsar
  • Blueberry: Arizona Love Chapter 2

Overview

Our Rebel heroes seek help from the Mon Calamari in evacuating their Yavin base, but soon get embroiled in a mystery involving a distress beacon of unknown origin, scads of Imperial troopers, giant sea worms, an amphibian rescue, more giant sea worms, a droid or two, a few more scads of Imperial troopers, and just a bit more excitement than a 32-page color comic book has any right to provide.
name: Iceworld (part 2), Revenge of the Jedi (part 1)

description:
Acclaimed fantasy author Jane Yolen and artist Charles Vess tell the tale of "King Henry," part of a semi-regular series teaming Vess with famous authors to adapt famous ballads to comics. Also: Hermes' mighty Caduceus disguised as a baseball bat! A Mafia princess on the lam! A talking skull in a box! It could only be Eddie Campbell's Hermes vs. The Eyeball Kid! Plus, romance at the dawn of man in part 2 of an all-new Paleolove adventure.

Chapters

  • King Henry
  • Paleolove - Part 2
  • Hermes vs. The Eyeball Kid - Part 3, "Skeleton in the Closet."
name: King Henry; Paleolove; Hermes vs. The Eyeball Kid

description: The time is the lawless '30s, the place is New York City, and justice carries two loaded .44s! The Shadow is faced with a monster who is terrorizing New York, attacking its victims in the sewers, slicing them up and burning them alive! The Shadow must combat this threat, but what can bullets do against a supernatural foe? The Shadow knows!

volume.name: The Shadow: In the Coils of Leviathan

description:
Superman is back...and so is Clark Kent! Now it's time for him to reunite with the love of his life, Lois Lane.

Superman has Returned! After apparently dying at the hands of Doomsday, Superman has finally made his was back to Metropolis and back to Lois Lane. While Superman has returned from the dead the same can not be said for Clark Kent, who is still pronounced dead. How will Lois and Superman find a way to bring Clark Kent back? Can he come back without people realizing that Clark Kent is really Superman?

Notes:

  • Newstand and direct sales issues priced at $1.50.
  • Foil cover edition priced at $3.50.
  • Triangle 1993 #31.
  • Chronological continuation from Superman #82.
  • Chronological continuation in Action Comics #692.
name: Reign of the Superman!

description: Maxine struggles with bullies at school, and the fact that Buddy is legally dead. Can the Bakers get through this together?
name: Breath of God

description:
Jean-Paul escapes serious injury when falling from a tall building, and blames the costume for slowing him down in his encounter with Bane. Absorbed in the System, he designs and creates a new one, very different from the classic Batman costume. Meanwhile, Nightwing learns that Bruce has passed the role of Nightwing on to Jean-Paul, and Mayor Krol forbids the police from interfering in any of Batman's activities. Clad in his new costume, Batman heads out for a final confrontation with Bane. Exploiting Bane's dependence on the Venom drug, he is, in time, victorious. At the last moment he pulls back from killing Bane, much to the relief of both Robin and Commissioner Gordon, the latter of whom is beginning to suspect that this isn't the Batman he knows.

Notes:

  • 64 page issue.
  • Wraparound cover by Jose Quesada and Kevin Nowlan.
  • Wraparound cover is an embossed edition.
  • Direct sales and newsstand cover by Kelley Jones.
  • Covers colored by Bob LeRose.
  • Covers supervised by Curtis King.
  • Pencils and inks by Jim Aparo and Terry Austin from pages 1-28.
  • Pencils and inks by Mike Manley from pages 29-56.
  • Part 1: The Fall.
  • Part 2: The Descent.
name: Dark Angel

description:
The story is told in 3 acts.

Act 1: Batman is investigating a scene and the clues lead him to Talia. Talia explains she is looking for a statue stolen from Rha's and that she will be leaving Gotham. She offers to travel together, knowing that he will follow. Batman's only interest is in the thief's location.

Act 2: Talia finds Bruce Wayne in his hotel room (meaning they arrived separately) and drags him out on a date. Following a series of romantic events, just as they are getting touchy Bruce decides to call it a day. They follow the trail of the statue together, but are caught and tied inside a warehouse that is set on fire.

Act 3: As they are escaping the fire, Talia confronts Bruce about their proposal. Following a kiss, Batman escapes to attack the thugs while Talia stops the big boss from getting away and recovers the statue. Batman asks what was inside it and Talia departs broken hearted.
name: Last Tango in Paris

description: To evade the agents of a mysterious and sinister corporation, Black Orchid must test the limits of her mind-manipulating abilities.
name: Uprootings
